revision.text:
<languages/> '''Rare Hold Items''' can be dropped by wild Pokémon on [[Route Statistics|Routes]] or in [[Dungeons|Dungeons]]. The chance for Underground-type items to be dropped on routes is <math>\frac{1}{2048}</math>, while the chance for other item types is <math>\frac{1}{512}</math>. This chance is increased by 50% when the [[Dowsing Machine]] is in effect. The chance for a drop in dungeons is 4 times higher than on routes.
{| class="wikitable sortable" ! Item Type !! Route Odds !! Dungeon Odds !! Route Odds with Dowsing Machine !! Dungeon Odds with Dowsing Machine |- | Evolution || 1/512 || 1/128 || 1/341 || 1/85 |- | Berry || 1/512 || 1/128 || 1/341 || 1/85 |- | Underground || 1/2048 || 1/512 || 1/1365 || 1/341 |- | DNA* || - || 1/15 || - || 1/10 |}
'''*Note:''' Black and White DNA are evolution items with a heightened drop rate and are only found from Zekrom and Reshiram in the [[Dragonspiral Tower]] dungeon. These cannot be traded from the berry master.
=Pokémon with held items=
All of these items can be found in other ways.
[[Evolution Items|Evolution-type]]: Evolution Items that otherwise can either be bought in [[Shops]] or mined in the [[Underground]]. These items are found in the Items tab of the menu.
[[Underground|Underground-type]]: Collectible items that otherwise can be found in the Underground that are not evolution items.
[[Berries|Berry-type]]: Berries that otherwise can be grown and harvested in the [[Farm]].
